Ohe manabagosthi! Tomara yadi punarut'thana sanbandhe sandehera madhye thaka, tahale amara to tomadera srsti karechi mati theke, tarapara raktapinda theke tarapara mansera tala theke -- gathane susamanjasa o samanjasyabihina, yena amara tomadera jan'ya suspasta karate pari. Ara tomadera madhye ke'u ke'u mrtyumukhe patita haya ara tomadera madhye ka'uke ana haya jibanera adhamatama dasaya yara phale jnanalabhera pare se kichu'i na-jana haya.
